BULL-FUCKING-SHIT YOU HAVE.  I'm 20 - I've been into Transformers as 
long as anyone else who would have even the remotest interest in this 
RPG.

And take that "Rookie" comment and stick it somewhere painful.  I've 
been roleplaying my WHOLE DAMN LIFE.

You got a problem with that, TOUGH LUCK.
